page.title: 14ARTS AND CRAFTS
page.content: Arts and Crafts Blackhead. Wooden toys are made by a retired Vice-Chairman of Mencap from Cheshire. He lives at Herons Pool on the main Coverack road and sells items to passing visitors and at local shows particularly the Coverack Craft Club show. His 80 year old neighbour makes model ships and is now making a spinning wheel. Trevothen Farmhouse has just been bought by an Artist-Potter who is hoping to start a residential Craft School.This farmhouse previously belonged to a metal sculptor who has left several large pieces behind on barn walls. The farmer at Treleaver is skilled at modernising farm buildings
